sumireko:SkillChoice.NAME: Skill
sumireko:SkillChoice.DESCRIPTION: I can say with confidence it must be a Skill.

IDEAS: Sleeved cards are active while in the draw pile.
PROS: Easy to pick up, have usually active benefits that can be easily stacked.
CONS: When drawn, they're basically bricks, and will do nothing for a while if you discard them.
Keep values relatively low so they don't go out of control too easily.
Sleeved cards: Upfront value. Seals/Occult: Value that requires setup.
Visual: Transparent images of the objects will float around you while they are in your draw pile. Transparency decreases with multiple copies.

sumireko:Ponder.NAME: Ponder
sumireko:Ponder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

sumireko:VoodooDoll.NAME: Voodoo Doll
sumireko:VoodooDoll.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Sleeved: Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage to the enemy with the least HP.
sumireko:VoodooDoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle this card into your draw pile. NL sumireko:Sleeved: Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage to the enemy with the least HP.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't play this card.

Below this point are cards which have no.DESCRIPTION: If you're a translator, don't go any further.

sumireko:Restructure.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a card from your discard pile into your draw pile.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: (Deals !D! damage.) NL

sumireko:Daruma.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL sumireko:Sleeved: At the start of your turn, put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

sumireko:BrokenClock.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL sumireko:Sleeved: The 6th card you play each turn is played twice.
sumireko:BrokenClock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL sumireko:Sleeved: The 6th card you play each turn is played twice.

sumireko:PowerGlove.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL sumireko:Sleeved: Attacks deal !M! additional damage.

sumireko:PrayerBeads.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL sumireko:Sleeved: When you run out of [E], make a card in your hand sumireko:Occult and Exhaust this card.
sumireko:PrayerBeads.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL sumireko:Sleeved: When you run out of [E], make a card in your hand sumireko:Occult and discard this card.

sumireko:OminousStatue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sumireko:Sleeved: At the start of your turn, draw 1 less card.

sumireko:IllusoryDouble.DESCRIPTION: Create a clone with !M! HP for one turn that will receive enemy attacks. NL Exhaust.
sumireko:IllusoryDouble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a clone with !M! HP for two turns that will receive enemy attacks. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:IllusoryForm.NAME: Illusory Form
sumireko:IllusoryForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, you may Exhaust a card to create a clone with HP equal to its cost that will receive enemy attacks. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:SealedDeck.NAME: Sealed Deck
sumireko:SealedDeck.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least !M! cards in your hand. NL Draw cards until your hand is full.

sumireko:Vibrant.NAME: Vibrant Something (2 cost)
sumireko:Vibrant.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you played at least !M! cards this turn. NL Gain [E] [E] [E].

sumireko:MindBreaker.NAME: Mind Breaker
sumireko:MindBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Enemy deals half as much damage this turn.

sumireko:EternalSealA.NAME: Eternal Seal
sumireko:EternalSealA.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage. Return this card to your hand.

sumireko:MassSealButPower.NAME: idk
sumireko:MassSealButPower.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each card in your hand.

sumireko:MassSealB.NAME: Mass Seal
sumireko:MassSealB.DESCRIPTION: Play additional copies of this card equal to this card's cost. NL sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage.

sumireko:MirrorImage.NAME: Mirror Image
sumireko:MirrorImage.DESCRIPTION: Create a mirror image of the enemy. NL The enemy takes all damage dealt to the mirror image.

sumireko:Notes.DESCRIPTION: To fill out: Some more stuff that synergizes with seals, perhaps topdeck mechanic a bit. A bit more unplayable/locking. Powers for these.
sumireko:Notes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Glue cards that link some of these mechanics together. I think Final is fleshed out enough. Perhaps some minor synergy in the glue cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: THE CHOPPING BLOCK: Banish. It's unnecessary with other draw tools existing and doesn't really synergize much.
Materialism provides a bit too much draw. It's 'anti seal' but just works well with them anyways. Make it instead of draw, an attack?
Locked and Unplayable cards cost 1 less? Pain to code.
Strength now affects Seals and Prowess affects Attacks. Not enough support and also busted with the support that exists.
Whenever you play a card, some effect based on its cost.
Cards ____ equal to their cost
Whenever you play cards that cost a total of !M! [E], ___.
One more locking/unplayable card?
arrrrt.....?
Seals: Full card art. When hovered, text is displayed. Black background with representative symbol. Symbol is rendered separately
and scales separately. Will fill most of space on a small card and less of it on hovered card. (May need to do framebuffer stuff.)
Think i'm just gonna cancel the card cost supporty focused stuff (mass mash), maybe iron girders. Too finicky, and would require more support than I have room for.
Singular cards that interact with cost on their own are probably fine.

sumireko:CardTrick.NAME: Card Trick
sumireko:CardTrick.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
sumireko:CardTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Put a copy of it on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:Cage.NAME: Cage
sumireko:Cage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

sumireko:End.NAME: End
sumireko:End.DESCRIPTION: While in hand, increase this card’s cost by 1 this combat whenever you play another card. NL Deal damage equal to double this card’s cost.
sumireko:End.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: While in hand, increase this card’s cost by 1 this combat whenever you play another card. NL Deal damage equal to triple this card’s cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Deals !D! damage.)

sumireko:EchoSeal.NAME: Echo Seal
sumireko:EchoSeal.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played this combat was a sumireko:Seal, gain [E] and draw a card. NL sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage.

sumireko:OldEsotericSecrets.NAME: Esoteric Secrets
sumireko:OldEsotericSecrets.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! less damage from attacks for each sumireko:Locked or Unplayable card in your hand at the end of your turn.

sumireko:Doppelganger.NAME: Doppelganger
sumireko:Doppelganger.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of a card in your hand to your hand. NL Exhaust.
sumireko:Doppelganger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded copy of a card in your hand to your hand. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:Banish.NAME: Banish
sumireko:Banish.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Draw cards equal to its cost plus !M!.
sumireko:Banish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Draw cards equal to its cost plus !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust

sumireko:NightSeal.NAME: Night Seal
sumireko:NightSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage. NL If you have 3 active *Night *Seals, increase the damage of this card by !SEAL! permanently.

sumireko:MassMash (Not relevant enough t.NAME: Mass Mash
sumireko:MassMash (Not relevant enough t.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the total cost of cards in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Deals !D! damage.)

sumireko:BorderOfReality.NAME: Border of Reality
sumireko:BorderOfReality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 less Block for each sumireko:Occult card played this combat.

sumireko:OldMaterialism.NAME: Materialism
sumireko:OldMaterialism.DESCRIPTION: Discard all sumireko:Seals in your hand, then draw twice as many cards. NL Exhaust.
sumireko:OldMaterialism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all sumireko:Seals in your hand, then draw twice as many cards.

sumireko:EmptySeal.NAME: Empty Seal
sumireko:EmptySeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Final. NL Draw a card. NL sumireko:Seal.

sumireko:ExtensionSeal.NAME: Extension Seal
sumireko:ExtensionSeal.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL sumireko:Seal: Multiply the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals by !SEAL!.
sumireko:ExtensionSeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL sumireko:Seal: Multiply the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals by !SEAL!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locked. NL sumireko:Seal: Multiply the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals by !SEAL!.

sumireko:Occultation.NAME: Occultation
sumireko:Occultation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play X random sumireko:Occult cards from your draw and discard pile . NL Exhaust.
sumireko:Occultation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play X random sumireko:Occult cards from your draw and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:UnlockedSecrets.NAME: Unlocked Secrets
sumireko:UnlockedSecrets.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card you shouldn't be able to, gain [E].

sumireko:Lodestone.NAME: Lodestone
sumireko:Lodestone.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Gain !B! Block. NL This card is not shuffled into your draw pile.
sumireko:Lodestone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Maybe in a character with more return-from-discard effects.

sumireko:HeavyKnowledge (Cost stuff isn'.NAME: Heavy Knowledge
sumireko:HeavyKnowledge (Cost stuff isn'.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 3 or more, add a random sumireko:Seal card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn and has sumireko:Fragile.

sumireko:Rare Occult Card.NAME: Finale
sumireko:Rare Occult Card.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL cards that are not sumireko:Occult. Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted.

sumireko:CursedSeal.NAME: Cursed Seal
sumireko:CursedSeal.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL sumireko:Seal: Sets the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals to 0.

sumireko:RecessesOfTheMind.NAME: Recesses of the Mind
sumireko:RecessesOfTheMind.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL This card is your discard pile.

sumireko:ooooo.NAME: ooooo
sumireko:ooooo.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Startup: Draw a card.

sumireko:Heartstone.NAME: Heartstone (poopy)
sumireko:Heartstone.DESCRIPTION: When this card is drawn, increase the cost of cards in your hand by 1 this turn. NL Deal 40 damage.

sumireko:Sever.NAME: Sever (meh.)
sumireko:Sever.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Final. NL Deal damage equal to the enemy's missing health, up to !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Final. NL Deal damage equal to the enemy's missing health, up to !M!. NL (Deals !D! damage.)

sumireko:Toss.NAME: Toss (Too Jank)
sumireko:Toss.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards. NL Trigger the end of turn effects of discarded sumireko:Seals.

sumireko:ShowOfPower.NAME: Show of Power (Final is no longer an archetype.)
sumireko:ShowOfPower.DESCRIPTION: Play !M! random sumireko:Final cards from your draw pile.

sumireko:FundamentalMastery.NAME: Fundamentals
sumireko:FundamentalMastery.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Final. NL sumireko:Final cards are played an additional time.

sumireko:MindEye.NAME: Mind's Eye
sumireko:MindEye.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards from your draw pile. Put a copy of it into your hand. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:VuDuDoll.NAME: Vu-Du Doll
sumireko:VuDuDoll.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength at the end of each of its turns. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:TormentNo.NAME: TormentWaitThisIsJustAmplifyFromMarisa
sumireko:TormentNo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose [E]. NL If you do, deal !D! additional damage.

sumireko:eeee.NAME: eeee
sumireko:eeee.DESCRIPTION: Discard all but one card from your draw pile. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

sumireko:OldMindEye.NAME: Mind's Eye
sumireko:OldMindEye.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 1 more this turn.
sumireko:OldMindEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL They cost 1 more this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locked. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 1 more this turn.
sumireko:Locked. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL They cost 1 more this turn.

sumireko:ChainBlock.NAME: Chain Block
sumireko:ChainBlock.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Final. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Copies of this card created during combat cost 0.

sumireko:IllegalDumping.NAME: Illegal Dumping
sumireko:IllegalDumping.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if the total cost of cards in your hand is at least !M!. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I only have
total cost.

sumireko:LuckyCharm.NAME: Lucky Charm (Replaced with sleeved archetype stuff.)
sumireko:LuckyCharm.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Increase this card's Block by 1. NL While in hand, gain !M! Block whenever you play another card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Not locking anymore... sumireko:Locked. NL Increase this card's Block by 1. NL While in hand, gain !M! Block whenever you play another card.

sumireko:IllusoryVeil.NAME: Illusory Veil (super anti-sleeved synergy)
sumireko:IllusoryVeil.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, discard your draw pile and gain Block equal to the number of cards discarded.

sumireko:Simplicity.NAME: Simplicity (Final is no longer an archetype.)
sumireko:Simplicity.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Final. NL Gain [E] for every 6 unupgraded cards in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Final. NL Gain !M! [E]. NL (Gain [E] for every 6 unupgraded cards in your deck.)

sumireko:JustAnIllusion.NAME: Just An Illusion
sumireko:JustAnIllusion.DESCRIPTION: Take no damage for !M! turns. NL When this effect wears off, take all damage prevented. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:ReleasingRitual.NAME: Releasing Ritual
sumireko:ReleasingRitual.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have 5 active sumireko:Seals, make a random card in your draw pile sumireko:Occult.

sumireko:MurderSeal.NAME: Murder Seal (Doesn't make sense to have anymore.)
sumireko:MurderSeal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sumireko:Seal: Lose !SEAL! HP.

sumireko:TruePentagram.NAME: True Pentagram
sumireko:TruePentagram.DESCRIPTION: All sumireko:Seals are adjacent to each other.
